title: A comment on prolegomena to OR modelling of the global environment-development problem
abstract: At the opening of one of his novels1, Salman Rushdie has his main character impatiently chide the book's narrative for being too elusive, for failing to spell out the specifics of its message. I must confess to a not dissimilar reaction on reading the paper by Dzidonu and Foster2
publisher: Palgrave Mcmillan on behalf of the Operational Research Society

        At the opening of one of his novels1, Salman Rushdie has his main character impatiently chide the book's narrative for being too elusive, for failing to spell out the specifics of its message.
